resources.string: To get started please connect to the internet by turning on your wifi or cellular data.
To register with Morphidose, please enter your hospital number below, and press the submit button.
You currently have no internet connection. Please ensure you have a connection before trying again.
Sorry, we couldn\'t find that hospital number in the Morphidose system. Please check the number and try again.
You haven\'t been prescribed any medication on our system yet. Please check with your prescriber and try again.
Sorry, there was an error while processing your data - let us try again.
You are ready to start logging doses of your breakthrough pain relief.
Press the \"Submit Breakthrough Dose\" button every time you take a dose of your breakthrough medication. You will see a confirmation to verify that the dose has been logged.
You are about to submit a dose.
All submitted doses have been sent to your prescriber.
IMPORTANT: You have some submitted doses stored on your device. Before your next appointment, please connect to wifi or turn on your cellular data to allow these doses to be sent to your prescriber.
Press this button to submit a dose of your breakthrough medication.
Press confirm if you have taken a dose of your breakthrough medication, or cancel if the submit button was pressed in error.
You are not connected to the internet so we couldn\'t verify your latest dose. If you have recently had a dose change then the displayed dose might not be up to date.
Your Latest Dose Cannot be Verified
